imdb.plot outline: The plot introduce the development of "new rural cooperative medical care" for the creation of background, about the contemporary rural areas in the new rural construction in the process of producing colorful interesting story of life. Jing Jing will play in the play as a tour guide "Li Changxiu", warm and kind, after experiencing numerous difficulties and finally harvest their own happiness. The play assembled many domestic performing artists, since the "soldier assault" popular "old white" left Tengyun, also from the "drama king" status gorgeous turn, return to the TV series, portrait to join the play. Left Tengyun graduated from the Central Academy of Drama, Coban background, he has his own set of performance style, comedy is not artificial, and the drama is quite happy. The play is the main description of the contemporary beautiful countryside in the new rural construction process occurred in the colorful, interesting, romantic happy life story. The play is full of easy, humorous, rich rural life and youth flying vigorous, is one of the few idyllic comedy.
imdb.title: Meili xiangcun langman shi
plot: A romantic happy life story. The play is full of easy, humorous, rich rural life and youth flying vigorous, is one of the few idyllic comedy.::7yuw
